		project as string,

		Subject as string,

	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> AL0012AE
AdverseEventsData, AL0031AdverseEvent, AL0012AE union(byName: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1))~> Union1
Union1 derive(AESTDATnew = iif(equals(instr(trim(AESTDAT),'UN'),1),concat('1-',substring(trim(AESTDAT),4,length(AESTDAT))),trim(AESTDAT))) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 derive(AESTDATnew1 = iif(greater(instr(AESTDATnew,'0:00'),1),toString(toDate(AESTDATnew, 'MM/dd/yyyy'), 'dd-MMM-yyyy'),trim(AESTDATnew))) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 sink(input(
		STUDYID as string,
		SITEID as string,
		SUBJID as string,
		COHORT as string,
		VISIT as string,
		TPT as string,
		DAT as string,
		TIM as string,
		SPEC as string,
		TEST as string,
		RESULT as string,
		UNIT as string,
		LLOQ as string,
		COMMENT as string,
		Days as string,
		RESULTS as string,
		dose as string,
		VisitHours as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['ADL.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FinalOutput
